title: Soba Noodle Salad With Bok Choy
summary: Soba Noodle Salad With Bok Choy might be just the main course you are searching for. Watching your figure? This dairy free and vegetarian recipe has 659 calories, 37g of protein, and 14g of fat per serving. This recipe serves 2. For $4.67 per serving, this recipe covers 57% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. A couple people made this recipe, and 29 would say it hit the spot. A mixture of eggs, soy sauce, hot sauce, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so yummy. To use up the rice vinegar you could follow this main course with the Red Velvet Mug Cake as a dessert. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 20 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 97%. This score is tremendous. Similar recipes include Garlic Ginger Zucchini Noodle Bowl with Salmon and Bok Choy, Quick Soba Noodle Salad With Coconutty Boy Choy, and Soba Noodle Soup with Chicken and Bok Choy.

winePairing.pairingText: No one wine will suit every pasta dish. Pasta in a tomato-based sauce will usually work well with a medium-bodied red, such as a montepulciano or chianti. Pasta with seafood or pesto will fare better with a light-bodied white, such as a pinot grigio. Cheese-heavy pasta can pair well with red or white - you might try a sangiovese wine for hard cheeses and a chardonnay for soft cheeses. We may be able to make a better recommendation if you ask again with a specific pasta dish.
